name: Spiders (robobarbie)
description:
One March morning, a new haunting case arrives on the desk of the local ghost detective agency. As the agency duo works to help the young spirit move on, they slowly grow wary of each others' hidden pasts, and realize that the secrets they are hiding could be fatal.

--

This is a kinetic visual novel mystery about love, death, and the desperate roads some will venture down for revenge. Play as three characters: 

  • Henry: the sarcastic medium
  • Adam: the confident newcomer
  • Ellen: the lonely flirt

The live demo is the first of three acts. I'll update this page when the next act is complete! 

--
